adrFormatAddress: 1845 Adam Clayton Powell Jr Blvd Ste 1, New York, NY 10026, USA

originalText.text: This dentist is truly amazing. The entire staff is incredibly kind and helpful. Usually, my anxiety skyrockets whenever I have to leave the house with my two kids, but bringing them here is always a pleasure. The dentist's work is exceptional as well. My daughter had some fillings done at a different place, but they kept chipping off. However, when she got them done at Open Bright about 8 months ago, they still look good and intact. My kids have never really been afraid of the dentist, but I've never seen them so excited about a dental appointment, especially since they know they'll get to leave with balloons. If you're in need of a pediatric dentist, definitely give them a try. You won't regret it.

originalText.text:
Open Bright is the BEST! Very friendly staff, professional and accommodating!  Dr.Lori
always makes my babies feel comfortable, explains everything and is extremely patient. The boss babies calls the shots here. They choose everything from the flavor toothpastes for treatment to the desired tv shows to watch during the visit to the color ballon after the visit. My kids are HAPPY to come and SAD to go. Thanks Dr. Lori  and OBP team.  My son smiling before extracting 2 teeth. ‚ò∫Ô∏èüòÖ

originalText.text: My daughter is so afraid of dentists because of a past experience with a different office. Open Bright was amazing from beginning to end. Mona was very gentle with my daughter, and let her touch each tool so she understood it would not hurt. They were all absolutely amazing!!!

text.text: My daughter is so afraid of dentists because of a past experience with a different office. Open Bright was amazing from beginning to end. Mona was very gentle with my daughter, and let her touch each tool so she understood it would not hurt. They were all absolutely amazing!!!

originalText.text: Best pediatric dental office in Harlem. Excellent manners and expertise. Very thankful that my children have been able to stay patients for so many years. (They're very prompt too. We didn't even have to wait after we walked in - but don't be late.) They're getting really good at sending me automatic text reminders so I don't forget our appointment again. So thankful for them.

originalText.text: Being a first time parent of a toddler is a new experience for me, so going to a dentist that offered a kid friendly and professional environment/staff was essential for my family. We were greeted and assisted as soon as we arrived. One of the team members made a balloon animal for us, gave us a dental doggie bag and a squishy toy giraffe. Dr. Laurie was very informative on what daily steps to take to maintain my daughter‚Äôs oral hygiene. Thank you all again. See you all in six months!
